body_html:
Thanks for the comment @jart. Sorry should have provided more info. The kokoro build is failing with /tmpfs/tmp/bazel/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/private/defs.bzl:27:16: The setconstructor for depsets is deprecated and will be removed. Please use thedepsetconstructor instead. You can temporarily enable the deprecatedset constructor by passing the flag --incompatible_disallow_set_constructor=false.

But I just realized this is due to the "io_bazel_rules_closure" dependency in the PR branch is too old.

@ychfan do you mind do a rebase?
